name: Renault Trucks
goal: Renault Trucks is one of the leading vehicle manufacturers, building on the legacy of more than a century of French truck know-how. It offers transport professionals with a wide range of services and vehicles adapted to local and regional distribution, construction and long distance activities. Renault Trucks employs about 9,500 people, and is part of the Volvo Group.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Urban Mobility, CO2 emissions from HDV, Mobility packages, ITS - connectivity, Road charging, Eurovignette, Review of the GSR regulation, Circular Economy, Data Protection, Data access, data economy, CPC Directive, Clean Vehicle Directive, Type-Approval and Brexit, Weights and Dimensions.
